properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Chokoloskee to Bonita Beach FL out 20 NM; Waters from Chokoloskee to Bonita Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from East Cape Sable to Chokoloskee FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 20 at 5:08PM EST until January 22 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
3 to 6 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Chokoloskee to Bonita Beach FL out
20 NM, Coastal waters from East Cape Sable to Chokoloskee FL
out 20 NM and Waters from Chokoloskee to Bonita Beach FL from
20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...through to 7 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

A sudden onset of rough seas may cause hazardous conditions,
which may occur suddenly at jetties and inlets. These conditions
could catch boaters by surprise. Boaters should use caution when
entering or exiting the inlets and jetty areas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY
